title: Is the COVID-19 virus becoming less virulent? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. It is not becoming less virulent. And in fact more symptoms are being understood to be caused by the virus, some people who’ve “recovered” have developed heart problems, respiratory issues and more. They are STILL finding out more about the virus, and it is far worse than the initially believed, and there’s still far more to learn about the behavior of the virus. Unusual symptoms of coronavirus: What are they? https://kutv.com/news/nation-world/list-of-covid-19-symptoms-is-growing-heres-what-to-look-for Coronavirus in Babies and Kids

“Is the COVID-19 virus becoming less virulent?” No. It’s responding to the foolishness of our misguided efforts to stop it. Becoming more rapid, severe and destructive aka more virulent. While also being more accurate in its targeting of the intended victims. New York and the Northeast continue to be the hardest hit.
